patthana16.66:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.66:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
